name: Bluechip Call Center
description:
Bluechip call center, is the most illustrious name amongst the Call Centers in India. Established in 2004, we have been the front runners in the trade ever since. We believe in a flat world which enables the business on one side of the globe to take advantage from markets and services available on the other side of the globe.
India’s educated and abundant human resource has led us to become the back office of the world.Bluechip call center is the most trusted name for our clients from across continents in USA, UK, Australia, South America, Netherlands etc. Bluechip call center provides a wide range of top-notch value-based offshore outsourcing solutions for diverse business requirements of its global clients. Our strength lies in our vast pool of expert resources having huge experience and specialization in their particular domains and holding multiple skills. Further, our proven working process, subject matter expertise and expertise in people management enables us to deliver most well aimed and focused services to our clients.
